item.title: MySQL - Insert from Select with placeholders
item.description: Situation When creating a monster joined table (a view was to slow), is is sometimes faster to make a table with placeholders and afterwards fill it with update queries… Requirements Not a fixed table = less work when upstrean a new field is added NULL placeholders, but with the correct structure Query CREATE TABLE temp.

item.title: MySQL - Sort with an exeption
item.description: Situation This query must give the data for a dropdown list in a html form. Requirements If nothing is selected, “9999 - tbd”, must be the first choise make sure the current name is in the list, even if it is inactive today sort names alphabeticly Test Data CREATE TABLE temp.
